p: Whereas previously pest issues were ‘resolved’ using broad-spectrum insecticides, the current roll-back of these products offers opportunities for novel and more sustainable alternatives. However, these methods are almost invariably more knowledge-intensive and require studies to assess if, how, and under which conditions, they can provide sustainable control and secure food production and economic growth. We hope that the current study contributed to this, particularly for African smallholder and large-scale farming settings.
